item.description:
Join us for The Wildest Dream, Conquest of Everest starring Conrad Anker and Narrated by Liam Neeson.

Trailer: http://movies.nationa...

Synopsis: Conrad Anker tries to unravel the mystery of the death of George Mallory on Mount Everest. Read More

This movie is out on extremely limited release. The only place showing it in the state is The Connecticut Science Center in Hartford.

We highly suggest purchasing your tickets online ahead of time to avoid a sell out. Buy Tickets Here We'll be meeting up at the CT Science Center box office at 7pm to get good seats.

Click here for directions to The CT Science Center in Hartford

Hope to see you there...email any questions to Nate
item.how_to_find_us: We'll meet at the CT Science Center box office promptly at 7pm
item.name: The Wildest Dream - Conquest of Everest (Movie)
